scripts.build-demo-app: powershell rm ./dist/* -Recurse && ng build ngx-scroll-position-restoration --configuration=production && ng build demo-app --configuration=production --baseHref=/ngx-scroll-position-restoration/
scripts.deploy-demo-app-on-github-pages: npm run build-demo-app && powershell cp ./dist/demo-app/index.html ./dist/demo-app/404.html && gh-pages -d ./dist/demo-app/ && powershell rm ./dist/* -Recurse
scripts.build: powershell rm ./dist/* -Recurse && ng build ngx-scroll-position-restoration --configuration=production && powershell cp ./LICENSE,./README.md ./dist/ngx-scroll-position-restoration/
scripts.publish-library: npm run build && npm publish ./dist/ngx-scroll-position-restoration/ && powershell rm ./dist/* -Recurse
